title: Chocolate Strawberry Smoothie.
directions: Place two frozen bananas, the strawberries, and 1/4 cup of non-dairy milk in a blender. Blend until smooth, adding more non-dairy milk if needed.
Pour the strawberry smoothie into two glasses.
Place the other two bananas, cocoa powder, 1/4 cup non-dairy milk, and sunbutter into the blender. Blend until smooth.
Pour the chocolate smoothie into the glasses on top of the strawberry smoothie. Garnish with fresh strawberries and chocolate chunks.
ingredients: 4 frozen bananas I slice bananas, then freeze them so that they blend easily.
1/2 cup non-dairy milk You may need more or less depending on how thick you want the smoothie.
